channel.title: Blog on charly3pins.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on charly3pins.dev

item.title: How to add Google Analytics to your Hugo site
item.description: Quick tutorial how to integrate Google Analytics in a Hugo website.

item.title: Raspberry Pi media player with Plex, Transmission, Sonarr, Bazarr and Jackett
item.description: Build your own media player using a BitTorrent client (Transmission), a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users (Sonarr), an API Support for your the torrent trackers (Jackett), a manager of subtitles in Sonarr & Radarr (Bazarr) and a clientâ€“server media player (Plex).

item.title: Understanding Semantic Versioning 2.0 (SemVer)
item.description: What semantic versioning is? Why is it important to use it in your projects as a developer? What does it mean for a user that uses your library?

item.title: Level up your presentations with Go
item.description: Generate easily your presentations with present, the tool powered by Go that generates and renders your slides.

item.title: Getting and Creating Projects
item.description: Mastering Git commands: Initial commands to get and create projects.

item.title: Custom commit messages
item.description: Generate custom commit messages for your repo and standarize your commits log.

item.title: Hugo's content and templates managing
item.description: How to organize your content and create your templates to get maximum value from Hugo.

item.title: Installing Drone 0.8 on Ubuntu 16.04
item.description: Simple post explaining how to install Drone on Ubuntu 16.04 server.

item.title: Gophercises - Quiz game
item.description: Code review of my first exercise in the Gophercises page. It's focused in the CSV and time packages in addition to an introduction for the goroutines and channels.

item.title: Building static blog with Hugo
item.description: Quick steps to create your own static blog with Hugo and install a theme from the catalogue. After that, push your site to GitHub and deploy it with GitHub Pages.
